text: Pool of London is a 1951 British crime drama movie directed by Basil Dearden and starring Earl Cameron, Bonar Colleano, Susan Shaw, Max Adrian, Moira Lister, James Robertson Justice, Sam Kydd, Leslie Phillips, Ian Bannen, Christopher Hewett. It was distributed by Ealing Studios. ==Other websites== * Category:1951 crime drama movies Category:British crime drama movies Category:Movies directed by Basil Dearden Category:Movies set in London
title: Pool of London
